com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.inventory

Class ExclusiveSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.inventory.Slot
      • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.inventory.ExclusiveSlot

  • public class ExclusiveSlot
extends net.minecraft.inventory.Slot
    A slot implementation which allows for slots to have a black/whitelist of items allowed
